briefTitle: Muscle Parameters and Pathological Response in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: The Relation Between the Initial Value of the Skeletal Mass Index and Pathological Response
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Early and locally advanced operated breast cancer patients receiving neoadjuvant chemotherapy.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients who did not receive neoadjuvant chemotherapy, had metastatic breast cancer and whose radiological images were not available.
